ygData.subject: Re: Feign Death vs. casters and anomolous failures
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Once uopn a time there was a Monk who was going to Freepoet after getting her red headband in Qeynos she was all the way to the west Commans when she
ygData.messageBody:
: tells a quick story of woe

Once uopn a time there was a Monk who was going to Freepoet after getting
her red headband in Qeynos she was all the way to the west Commans when she
happened upon a hill Giant who decided to step on her. She feigned death
the Giant thinking he had killed our heroine walk off and started crushing
people in derv camp which was was pretty far away she could barely see it
in the distance. Rather hurt the Monk stood and mended her wounds. The
Giant who was no were near her can RUNNING BACK and procceded to kill her.
She rewake in Qeynos were she was bound and started the long run back to the
commans and her body woundering why the Hill Giant came running back just
for her.

The end.

: Adds a quick almost tale of Woe

Later while she was in East Karana she was jumped by a goruge hound she ran
to the gaurds already hurt and bleeding from a fight with a Gnoll, seeing
the gurads of the fishing village (though they were trying there best to
kill it) would not be able to before it killed her in time she feigned
death. The hound looked at her for a moment and walked off she opened an
eye and looked around for a few minutes to make sure it was NO WERE in sight
before standing up she even had time to sit down to try to heal when all of
a sudden IT CAME RUNNING BACK! Luckally the gurads were able to slay the
thing in time (lived by 23 hps).

The end (for real this time)

So heres the question: ummmm is this whats soposed to happen?

Palerose 19th circle Monk of the Ashen order who thinks its about time she
looked in to buying more mesh armor.
